Title: Redwood is vulnerable to account takeover via dbAuth "forgot-password"
Description: This is an API vulnerability in Redwood's [dbAuth], specifically the dbAuth forgot password feature: - only projects with the dbAuth "forgot password" feature are affected - this vulnerability was introduced in v0.38.0
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 0.38.0 before 2.2.5, all versions starting from 3.0.0 before 3.3.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 0.38.0, all versions starting from 2.2.5 before 3.0.0, all versions starting from 3.3.1
